title: Type ID Please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/IMG_6295_5427.JPG)

Hello,

Hope someone knows what this is...

Thanks in advance

e

 [‹ Wildlife Conservation upright brush script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46797 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please Help Identify this type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163900/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46807 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pakcola

comments.content:
Looks like Palatino to me

p@

I don’t think it’s Palatino. Poor Richard is close, but I can’t tell for sure since your picture is a bit blurry.

- Lex
There’s also [Benjamin](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907163900/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/richard_beatty/benjamin/) (very similar to Poor Richard)
Looks close to Goudy oldstyle, or maybe even a traditional Garamond (like Adobe Garamond, not the ITC version(s))... but the high center of the M is throwing me.
